JOIN MP CHUKA UMUNNA ON OUR SOCIAL MIXING PROJECT!
Dear {!Contact.Name},
The Challenge exists to find creative ways to bring together people from different ethnicities, income backgrounds, and age groups. We believe that social integration is a topic that is becoming increasingly important, so we are launching an exciting new project in partnership with MP Chuka Umunna!
Have your say and kick-start your thoughts on how diverse and socially integration our country really is.
If you are interested in attending please order yourself a free ticket here!
Details:
- When? Monday 21st March 9:45am to 11am
- Where? Holst Room â€“ Morley College. 61 Westminster Bridge Road. London, Greater London SE1 7HT
- If you need a letter from us at TCS to get out of school for this event then please feel free to email us and we will send you one over!
Feel free to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org if you have any questions or queries.
Ola Awosika
Graduate Programme Associate Manager - South West London
